comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of April 9, 1914 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F50B10FB3D5E1373... A report from London mentions a "Lieut. General Sir Henry Crichton Sclater" being appointed Adjutant General. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Sclater

comment._content: Thanks for your research swanq. We'll add more information to the record the next time we update.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: These 1920 portraits in Britain's National Portrait Gallery, show him 5 years older and with more honors, including his 1919 Knight Grand Cross (Military Division), Order of the British Empire. www.npg.org.uk/collections/search/person/mp60772/sir-henr...
